sn22.68:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.68:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu …pe… atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.68:1.4: “Yo kho, bhikkhu, anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo”ti.
sn22.68:2.1: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi”ti?
sn22.68:2.2: “Rupam kho, bhante, anatta; tatra me chando pahatabbo.
sn22.68:2.6: vinnanam anatta; tatra me chando pahatabbo.
sn22.68:2.7: Imassa khvaham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami”ti.
sn22.68:3.2: Sadhu kho tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi.
sn22.68:3.3: Rupam kho, bhikkhu, anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn22.68:3.7: vinnanam anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn22.68:3.8: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attho datthabbo”ti …pe…
sn22.68:3.9: annataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahatam ahositi.
